query.entry: INSERT INTO patient(PatientID, FirstName, LastName, Sex, DateofBirth, Email, PhoneNumber, NIC, Address, City, ZipPostalCode, AdditionalInfo) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
INSERT INTO PatientDiat(DiatName, StartDate, EndDate, PatientID) VALUES(NULL,NULL,NULL,?)
SELECT MAX(P.PatientID) AS MaxPID FROM patient P
SELECT * FROM patient p where p.PatientID like ? OR p.FirstName like ? OR p.LastName like ?
UPDATE patient SET FirstName = ?, LastName = ?, Sex = ?, DateofBirth = ?, Email = ?, PhoneNumber = ?, NIC = ?, Address = ?, City = ?, ZipPostalCode = ?, AdditionalInfo = ? WHERE PatientID = ?

SELECT p.PatientID,p.FirstName,p.LastName,f.DiatName,f.StartDate,f.EndDate FROM patient p, PatientDiat f where p.PatientID = f.PatientID AND (p.PatientID like ? OR p.FirstName like ? OR p.LastName like ?)
UPDATE PatientDiat SET DiatName = ?, StartDate = ?, EndDate = ? WHERE PatientID = ?
INSERT INTO operation(PatientID, OperationType, Doctor, OperationDate) VALUES(?,?,?,?)
INSERT INTO checkups(PatientID, CheckUpType,AdditionalInfo, CheckUpDate) VALUES(?,?,?,?)
INSERT INTO Channelling(DoctorsName, ChanelDate, ChannelSession, PatientID) VALUES(?,?,?,?)
SELECT Email FROM patient WHERE PatientID = ?
SELECT e.FirstName , e.LastName FROM Employee e WHERE e.Possition = 'Doctor'
INSERT INTO wardRounds(DoctorName, WardName, WardRoundDate, RoundTime) VALUES(?,?,?,?)
